intro: Epidendrum calliferum, commonly known as the showy epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its long, arching stems and clusters of fragrant, showy flowers that range in color from white to pink and yellow. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees and other structures in its natural habitat.
